name: on_farm
description: Is this observation on farm (not on station)

name: is_survey
description: Is this observation from a survey (not an experiment)

name: rep
description: Replication number (1, 2, 3, ...) For this specific observation

name: intercrops
description: Other crop grown together with the main crop

name: previous_crop
description: Crop grown on this plot in the prior season

name: crop_rotation
description: Crops grown in rotation on this plot

name: dmy_roots
description: Dry-weight biomass of fine roots per ha

name: dmy_stems
description: Dry-weight biomass of stems per ha

name: dmy_leaves
description: Dry-weight biomass of leaves per ha

name: dmy_storage
description: Dry-weight biomass of storage organs per ha

name: yield_part
description: The part of the crop that "yield" refer to (e.g. grain, tubers, roots, leaves, fruit)

name: yield
description: Fresh weight biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity, per ha

name: residue_yield
description: Fresh weight of the above ground biomass except for the harvestable parts at maturity, per ha

name: N_splits
description: Number of splits in the N_fertilizer application

name: P_fertilizer
description: P applied in inorganic fertilizer (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_fertilizer
description: K applied in inorganic fertilizer (as K, not K2O)

name: irrigation_number
description: How many times was the crop irrigated?

name: irrigation_amount
description: The total irrigation amount applied to the crop

name: rain
description: Total rainfall between planting and harvest

name: AUDPC
description: Area under the disease progress curve

name: rAUDPC
description: Area under the disease progress curve divided by the non-diseased season length

name: season_constraint
description: a constraint that occurred in this particular season (e.g. drought, flood)
